document.full_text: the organizing artists of a beijing art show who reserved a blank gallery wall with a small name tag as a show of support for detained artist-activist ai weiwei have been detained by police and their exhibit was shut down.
document.title: beijing artists detained after homage to ai weiwei
lines_and_colors: the organizing artists of a beijing art show who reserved a blank gallery wall with a small name tag as a show of support for detained artist-activist ai weiwei have been detained by police and their exhibit was shut down.
